actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-144, by Mr. Hastings (FL).

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 of Rule XXI. It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence now printed in the bill.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 60.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 388.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 199 (Roll no. 324).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 198 (Roll no. 325).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2082) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2008 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, the Community Management Account, and the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2082 (Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2008).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2082) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2008 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, the Community Management Account, and the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, and for other purposes.
